# Weights & Biases

Use `wandb/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "wandb-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "wandb/Qwen/Qwen3-235B-A22B-Instruct-2507",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `WANDB_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.inference.wandb.ai/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `WANDB_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://weave-docs.wandb.ai/guides/integrations/inference/
